pages.text: Speed through your mining tasks with the Insta-Break upgrade. Equipped tools can instantly break blocks, thanks to the addition of $(l:justdirethings:res_time_crystal)Time Crystals$(/l), drastically reducing the time it takes to gather materials.$(br2)Note: Energy use significantly increases based on the hardness of the block. Obsidian costs far more energy to instantly break than stone does.
